chef.bio: Marcus Means has a passion for healthy living and exercise. He has a certificate in plant-based nutrition from eCornell and loves nature. He also loves reading, good coffee and exploring new places.

recipes.name: Black bean recipes
recipes.description: This versatile storecupboard ingredient stars in top recipes including crowd-pleasing chilli, speedy tacos, sensational soups and much more.
recipes.ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 1 red bell pepper, 1 tsp chili powder, 1 tsp ground cumin, 2 cans black beans, 4 cups vegetable broth
recipes.cooking_method: In a large pot or Dutch oven heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and sauté until softened. Add red bell pepper, chili powder, and cumin and cook for another minute. Add black beans and vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cook for 20-25 minutes, until the vegetables are

recipes.name: Runner bean recipesi
recipes.description: Use up a summer glut or a bag of frozen runner beans in a wide range of pasta recipes, salads and side dishes, as well as aromatic curries.
recipes.ingredients: 4 cups trimmed and chopped runner beans, 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, 1/4 cup chopped fresh mint, 2 tbsp olive oil, 2 tbsp red wine vinegar
recipes.cooking_method: In a large pot of boiling salted water, blanch the runner beans for 3-4 minutes, until tender but still crisp. Drain and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking process. In a large bowl, combine runner beans, red onion, parsley, and mint. In a separate bowl.

recipes.name: Broad bean recipes
recipes.description: Pop these delicious bright beans from their pods and serve whole or crushed., dark chocolate and almonds
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups shelled broad beans, 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese, 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, 1 tbsp lemon juice
recipes.cooking_method: In a large pot of boiling salted water, blanch the broad beans for 3-4 minutes, until tender but still crisp. Drain and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking process. Remove the tough outer skins by gently squeezing the beans.

chef.bio: Rick Laughlin living in USA. Founder of Rick Food (@Rick.Food). The best place in the world is a kitchen, there you can get real magic!

recipes.name: Paella recipes
recipes.description: Serve up a fragrant paella to feed a crowd. This classic Spanish rice dish usually contains seafood, but we also have meat, veggie and mixed versions.
recipes.ingredients: 4 cups chicken broth, 1/4 teaspoon saffron threads, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1 onion, 1 red bell pepper, 1 green bell pepper, 3 cloves garlic
recipes.cooking_method: In a small saucepan, bring chicken broth to a simmer. Add saffron and let steep for 10 minutes. In a large paella pan or skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and bell peppers and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Healthy fish recipes
recipes.description: From lighter pies to makeover fish & chips, nothing's off the menu with our healthier fish dishes.
recipes.ingredients: 4 salmon fillets (about 6 ounces each), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 lemon, juiced and zested, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley.
recipes.cooking_method: Preheat oven to 375°F. Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice and zest, garlic, parsley, dill, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: White fish with sesame noodles
recipes.description: Whip up this tasty seabass served with spinach, noodles and sesame seeds in just 20 minutes. It makes a great choice if you're looking for a speedy supper
recipes.ingredients: 4 white fish fillets (such as cod or tilapia), 8 oz. whole wheat spaghetti or soba noodles, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tbsp. sesame oil, 1 tbsp. rice vinegar, 1 tbsp.
recipes.cooking_method: Preheat oven to 400°F. Cook the noodles according to package instructions, then drain and set aside. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, honey, grated ginger, minced garlic, and salt and pepper to taste.

chef.bio: Chef Justin Koslowsky is the Head Chef at USA, an rooftop restaurant in cosmopolitan Singapore. Milan-born and Naples-raised, He started his career at 18 and quickly rose through the ranks. He was awarded USA's Rising Chef in 2018 and is now leading the kitchen at the acclaimed USA.

chef.bio: Ahmad Kasdi Pic is a famous French Chef known for gaining three Michelin stars for her restaurant, Maison Pic, in southeast USA. He is the fourth male chef to win three Michelin stars, and was named the Best male Chef by The World's 50 Best Restaurants in 2015.

chef.bio: Jason Ludwig is a Sarajevo native who spent most of his life in Washington DC. At the request of his friends in the USA, in 2014 she created Balkan Lunch Box, a food website with traditional Balkan recipes.
